item.title: Can some1 help me with this short error that i cant get?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[code] if (useItemID == 301 && atObjectID == 2026) {

					if (playerLevel[10] >= 40) {
						sendMessage("you fish for as many lobsters as possiable");// message sent to player fishing
						addSkillXP((240*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
						addItem(377, 1); //add the raw lobsters
			}
		}
			else if (playerLevel[10] <= 40) {
			sendMessage("You do not have the correct level to cook this");
			}
			}
							if (playerLevel[10] >= 76) {
							sendMessage("Welcome to the Fishing Guild, Master Fisher "+playerName+", Please Enter");
							teleportToX = 2611;
							teleportToY = 3394;
							}
							else if (playerLevel[10] <= 75) {
							sendMessage("You need level 76 Fishing to Enter!");
			}
		}
			if (useItemID == 311 && atObjectID == 2026)  {  // harpoon used on fishing spot

					if (playerLevel[10] >= 40) { // fishing level 40 needed to do the next actions

}
sendMessage(“you use the harpoon to catch some swordfish”);// message sent to player fishing
addSkillXP((140*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
addItem(371, 1); //add the raw swordfish
}
}
else if (playerLevel[10] <= 40) { // if fishing level is lower than 40 does the following actions
sendMessage(“You do not have the correct level to cook this”); // sends this message if fishing level is less than 40
}
}

			if (useItemID == 303 && atObjectID == 2026)  {  // small fishing net used on fishing spot
                            }
					if (playerLevel[10] >= 0) { // fishing level 0 needed to do the next actions
						sendMessage("you use the small fishing net to catch some shrimp");// message sent to player fishing
						addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
						addItem(317, 1); //add the raw shrimp
			}
			}[/code]

Now try and show me what errors u get

item.title: Can some1 help me with this short error that i cant get?
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[code] if (useItemID == 301 && atObjectID == 2026) {

					if (playerLevel[10] >= 40) {
						sendMessage("you fish for as many lobsters as possiable");// message sent to player fishing
						addSkillXP((240*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
						addItem(377, 1); //add the raw lobsters
			}
		}
			else if (playerLevel[10] <= 40) {
			sendMessage("You do not have the correct level to cook this");
			}
			}
							if (playerLevel[10] >= 76) {
							sendMessage("Welcome to the Fishing Guild, Master Fisher "+playerName+", Please Enter");
							teleportToX = 2611;
							teleportToY = 3394;
							}
							else if (playerLevel[10] <= 75) {
							sendMessage("You need level 76 Fishing to Enter!");
			}
		}
			if (useItemID == 311 && atObjectID == 2026)  {  // harpoon used on fishing spot
                             }
					if (playerLevel[10] >= 40) { // fishing level 40 needed to do the next actions
						sendMessage("you use the harpoon to catch some swordfish");// message sent to player fishing
						addSkillXP((140*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
						addItem(371, 1); //add the raw swordfish
			}
		}
			else if (playerLevel[10] <= 40) { // if fishing level is lower than 40 does the following actions
			sendMessage("You do not have the correct level to cook this"); // sends this message if fishing level is less than 40
			}
			}

			if (useItemID == 303 && atObjectID == 2026)  {  // small fishing net used on fishing spot

					if (playerLevel[10] >= 0) { // fishing level 0 needed to do the next actions
						sendMessage("you use the small fishing net to catch some shrimp");// message sent to player fishing
						addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
						addItem(317, 1); //add the raw shrimp
			}
			}[/code]

use that instead of what u have and tell me how many errors u have.

item.title: Can some1 help me with this short error that i cant get?
item.dc:creator: @ttyyssoonntt ttyyssoonntt
item.description:
@ttyyssoonntt wrote:

can some1 help me with this short error that i cant get??

client.java:14344: illegal start of type if (useItemID == 311 && atObjectID == 2026) { // harpoon used on fishing spot ^ client.java:14355: <identifier> expected } ^ client.java:14357: 'class' or 'interface' expected if (useItemID == 303 && atObjectID == 2026) { // small fishing net used on fishing spot ^ client.java:14378: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ client.java:31395: 'class' or 'interface' expected ^ 5 errors

this is the code the error is in!

[code] if (useItemID == 301 && atObjectID == 2026) {

					if (playerLevel[10] >= 40) {
						sendMessage("you fish for as many lobsters as possiable");// message sent to player fishing
						addSkillXP((240*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
						addItem(377, 1); //add the raw lobsters
			}
		}
			else if (playerLevel[10] <= 40) {
			sendMessage("You do not have the correct level to cook this");
			}
			}
							if (playerLevel[10] >= 76) {
							sendMessage("Welcome to the Fishing Guild, Master Fisher "+playerName+", Please Enter");
							teleportToX = 2611;
							teleportToY = 3394;
							}
							else if (playerLevel[10] <= 75) {
							sendMessage("You need level 76 Fishing to Enter!");
			}
		}
			if (useItemID == 311 && atObjectID == 2026)  {  // harpoon used on fishing spot

					if (playerLevel[10] >= 40) { // fishing level 40 needed to do the next actions
						sendMessage("you use the harpoon to catch some swordfish");// message sent to player fishing
						addSkillXP((140*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
						addItem(371, 1); //add the raw swordfish
			}
		}
			else if (playerLevel[10] <= 40) { // if fishing level is lower than 40 does the following actions
			sendMessage("You do not have the correct level to cook this"); // sends this message if fishing level is less than 40
			}
			}

			if (useItemID == 303 && atObjectID == 2026)  {  // small fishing net used on fishing spot

					if (playerLevel[10] >= 0) { // fishing level 0 needed to do the next actions
						sendMessage("you use the small fishing net to catch some shrimp");// message sent to player fishing
						addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[10]), 10); // add exp to fishing skill
						addItem(317, 1); //add the raw shrimp
			}
			}[/code]
